_header: I saw a dog seething souse
_description: A nonsense carol of ‘tall stories’ — seven quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Hay hey hey hey / I will haue the whetston and I may’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
I sawe a doge sethyng sowse& an ape thechyng an
                    howse…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Yet ys not long syth I made a lyeI will haue þe whetston
                    & I mayExplicit
